note.p: Son of Charles Richardson Johnson and his wife, Julianna Breedin. Lieutenant on HMS St Vincent. Died at the Royal Naval Hospital, Haslar, Gosport, Hampshire, of delirium tremens.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1658/6/5)
Certificate of death, 13 July 1868, Alverstoke, Hampshire (General Register Office, England)
Dorset History Centre, Dorset parish registers PE/LR (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 September 2016)
